entry.title: [GRA][Web Hosting] - Clusters maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Oct 30, 21:00 - 23:00 UTC

Sep 30, 14:58 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Web Hosting offer.

This may temporarily affect on configuration tasks.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [GRA1/2][Web Hosting] - Multiple Filerz maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Oct 7, 21:00 UTC  -  Oct 8, 04:00 UTC

Oct 6, 21:39 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our responsibilities for Web Hosting filerz, we will be performing infrastructure maintenance.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 07/10/2025 21:00 UTC
End time : 08/10/2025 04:00 UTC
Service impact : Concerned Filerz will be temporarily unavailable for 40 minutes during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be performing an update for the storage servers hosting your data.
This version brings improvements to certain security mechanisms, as well as some performance enhancements.

List of concerned Filerz:

- filerz481: Cluster102
- filerz580: Cluster014
- filerz638: Cluster010
- filerz158: Cluster026
- filerz41: Cluster022

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [GRA][Web Hosting] - Sharedsql incident notification
entry.content:
Oct 6, 12:13 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our has been resolved.

Start time : 06/10/2025 10:47 UTC
End time : 06/10/2025 11:55 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a hardware issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Oct 6, 11:23 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Oct 6, 11:23 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting Web Hosting offering, which is causing temporary availability issue for sharedsql027.eu013.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 06/10/2025 10:47 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Sharedsql027.eu013 are temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to access their databases.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a hardware issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
